sys_openapi_operation.name: Creates a new asset. - (POST) /assetmgmt/assets
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation: {"fName":"Creates a new asset.","fOperationId":"create","fDescription":"This API creates a new asset. To create a new asset, you will need the type of the asset you want to create (type_id), and to fill in the values of the mandatory fields of that specific asset type/template. You can get the ID of the available types of assets/templates using the /assetmgmt/templates endpoint. In order to get the fields of an asset, you can use the /assetmgmt/assets/blank endpoint.","fPath":"/assetmgmt/assets","fHttpMethod":"POST","fDeprecated":false,"fRequest":{"fDescription":"This object contains key-value pairs, where the key is the field\u0027s id, and the value is the value of this field. This model must contain every mandatory field with a value. \n\nNext to this, you can see an example model.","fRequired":false,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"requestapplicationjson3916795682","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/Example Create model","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"successful operation","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson4657989418","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/FrontendAsset","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"400","fDescription":"On validation errors","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson8595410984","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/ValidationErrorsResponse","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"403","fDescription":"When user doesn\u0027t have \u0027create\u0027 permission for the asset type.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[]}
